website_summaries.verdict: Great value for an impact driver. Has a high level of torque for the price you'll pay.
pros: Delivers up to 1,500 inch-pounds of torque
Uses a brushless motor that will give it a longer lifespan and better battery performance than some other models
Includes dual LEDs that illuminate the work area, which is a great feature in such a low-priced impact driver
Lightweight power tool makes it easier to use over time
cons: Doesn't offer an automatic changing of speeds
Not quite as powerful as other models

customer_reviews.title: driver tool for deck screws
customer_reviews.text: This tool is a most welcome addition to my collection. I did not know what I was missing having always used a standard 18V drill to drive deck screws. My brother, a contractor, introduced me to the way the "pros" drive deck fasteners and I'll never use a drill to drive screws again. The ratchet action coupled with the torx-type screw head prevents slippage and even driving very long fasteners is fairly easy. Do your self a favor and also invest in a set of driver bits if you order this tool.
customer_reviews.author: captain moore

customer_reviews.title: Impressive
customer_reviews.text: This is a great little driver. It has good balance and is comfortable to operate. The forward/reverse switch does hit weird on your hand like I’ve seen in other reviews, but I can’t imagine it’s a deal breaker unless you use it for long periods of time. It’s 20v dewalt counterpart is still my favorite tool, but I did switch to the Makita battery platform and am pretty happy with the quality and performance of their tools.
customer_reviews.author: Red72

customer_reviews.title: Good weight and balance
customer_reviews.text: No messing around with speed and torque settings, just pull the trigger and go. Good weight and balance. Good speed control, sips battery power! Will tackle small and big tasks with ease! Great tool
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Short, light, and powerful
customer_reviews.text: Great drill. I've been used to a carbon-brushed-equipped drill, also from makita, and this 1 is way stronger, lighter and smaller. Sounds like quality when you run it. Shipped from Missouri to California in 3 days. Sounds like a jet engine. Has good weight to it. Totally manageable in extended reaches. All the qualities I expect from makita.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Hunt

customer_reviews.title: Deck screw driving Son of a gun.
customer_reviews.text: My first one was a gift back in 2010 and I used and abused this little guy on rental house maintenance and around the home. It is getting a little weak now so a got another from Amazon. The wife and I are currently putting a metal roof on the barn with the new and the old driver with no problems. The only thing that makes me sad is they are not made in the USA.
customer_reviews.author: Franklin W. Cathcart

customer_reviews.title: Nice product.  As advertised.
customer_reviews.text: Nice product. As advertised. I suspect that seller is purchasing this item as part of a set with batteries and charger and then selling the individual components separately. I'm fine with this as I already had the batteries and a charger. The price was very good and the impact driver works very well.
customer_reviews.author: C. C. H.

customer_reviews.title: What a great tool
customer_reviews.text: This tool is much better than I ever expected. Compact and a very solid feel about it. for its compact size it delivered the strength needed to send in those 6” deck screws. it will take care of my pool fence around the back of the house.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Another great Makita tool
customer_reviews.text: Another great Makita tool. Very powerful and reliable. For the money Makita is hard to beat. I needed to contact Makita for technical questions and they too were very helpful unlike the yellow tool customer noservice.
customer_reviews.author: Toomuchamazon

customer_reviews.title: Is it new, or is it used?
customer_reviews.text: Drill works fine, at a good price. Only disappointment is that it does not come in factory packaging and there is no manual. Makes me wonder if it is really new or not.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Valley

customer_reviews.title: Used it to install a mailbox
customer_reviews.text: The first time I used it was to install a mailbox the other day and I was so surprised at the speed and strength. I will never use my drill again for putting screws in.
customer_reviews.author: JanF7

customer_reviews.title: Best Tool for a Beginner
customer_reviews.text: You want to do your own Handyman Jobs? The Impact Driver Drill is a MUST HAVE !!! I got Makita, we use Vaccum Cleaners from Makita and the same 18v Battery works for Drill too. Makita is World-Class quality, The Drill has great power and precision - You will be a Champion Handyman of your own house!

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: This did not come in a box and did not have the metal clip on it I’ve only tried once and it didn’t seem to have very good torque . Did I get a used product ? I may send this back I’m pretty disappointed

customer_reviews.title: Above and beyond
customer_reviews.text: Performance above and beyond. The Makita brand continues to impress keeping with their history of high quality and top line products. I own a construction company in Kenai Alaska where summers are short and winters are long which gives a small window for building, the Makita brand has proven to be reliable from -40 to 80 above with continuous use 16 hours a day, with the fast charging capabilities you will always have a full battery ready.

customer_reviews.title: Most amazing best tool ever

customer_reviews.text: Feels good in the hand and takes care of business. I build decks for a living and only use 3" and 6" screws. This thing works like a champ and doesn't tire out my hand using it all day. Awesome!!

customer_reviews.title: The Perfect Impact
customer_reviews.text: I've used many impact drivers over the years, especially those within the Makita lineup, and I can easily say that this is by far the best they have to offer. This thing is an absolute beast of an impact. It's impressively fast for a cordless. It's also incredibly durable (par for the course with Makita), feels great in your hand, and gets the job done with ease. I also use 4.0Ah batteries with mine, which makes this great drill even better. If you're looking into buying an impact, this is the one to buy. You most definitely will not be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Erik

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: I use it to speed up my work. It does the job.

customer_reviews.title: ... so i might change my mind So far the good things i can say are
customer_reviews.text: I Have been using it for a very short while so i might change my mind So far the good things i can say are: Right weight not too heavy or light, good grip, very powerful. The only bad thing i can say is that something about the motor spin feels cheap i can't quite describe however it's my first brushless tool so maybe this is how it should feel. Bottom line for the price paid it seems like a very good deal.

customer_reviews.title: Makita rocks solid!!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought it for doing heavy DIY around the house. I already have the xdt04z with brushes, I got it last year for moving from CT to North Carolina, taking apart furniture, antennas, beds etc. but I started to overdrive screws with the old one. First time with a Brushless tool in my shop and makes a lot of difference. The drill is powerful and run cool most of the time plus is comfortable and light. I just finish to set up a cedar fence around the house with 2 1/2 screws and is great. I got the bare tool without case and battery and together with the drill get the thing done around the house.

product_meta.title: Makita XDT13Z 18V LXT Lithium-Ion Brushless Cordless Impact Driver, Tool Only,
product_meta.description: Makita is the innovation leader in Brushless motor technology, and the 18V LXT Brushless impact driver (XDT13Z, tool only) combines power and run-time for a full range of fastening tasks. The efficient Makita BL™ Brushless motor is electronically controlled and engineered for longer run time, increased power and speed, and longer tool life. The variable speed Brushless motor delivers 0-3,400 RPM, 0-3,600 IPM, and up to 1,500 in.Lbs. Of max torque for efficient fastening. It has a compact design at 5” long and weighs only 3.3 pounds (with battery) with an ergonomic soft grip for user comfort. The L.E.D. Light illuminates the job area for applications in dark spaces.
feature_bullets: BL Brushless motor delivers 1,500 inch pounds Of max torque
Variable speed (0 to 3,400 RPM & 0 to 3,600 IPM) for a wide range of fastening applications
The BL Brushless motor eliminates carbon brushes, enabling the BL motor to run cooler and more efficiently for longer life
Efficient BL Brushless motor is electronically controlled to optimize battery energy use for up to 50 percent longer run time per charge
The electronically controlled BL Brushless motor efficiently uses energy to match torque and RPM to the changing demands of the application

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.7 out of 5 stars324 ratings4.7 out of 5 stars
